replies.msg:
尋日我放左段片上連登，片段內容係某 Campus Hall 既同學被拍用碌鳩鞭打男友人個頭，好快個 Post 就推爆左。

https://avgle.com/video/37068/%E9%9C%B2j-%E6%85%8E%E5%85%A5-%E6%9F%90-campus-hall-%E6%97%A2%E5%90%8C%E5%AD%B8%E5%81%9A%E5%92%A9%E7%94%A8%E7%A2%8C%E9%B3%A9%E9%9E%AD%E4%BA%BA%E5%80%8B%E9%A0%AD-%E5%94%94%E7%9F%A5%E5%92%A9-hall-mp4

https://lihkg.com/thread/187216/page/41?ref=web
- 分享自 LIHKG 討論區

今朝 SKY LEE HALL 就好快做左野，封哂 HALLMATE 口一句都唔準講，7 樓全層所有人 FB 都 DEL 哂野。

今日下就，我發現有好多陌生人加我 FB，更有人 FB 搵我比左 d 野我睇。
原來我已經被人起左底，原因係佢地老屈我係 JJ 佬 / 拍片者 (兩個身份都有)





我懷疑某 Hall 既人專登搞我，老屈我反咬我，所以我決定放多 D 資料上黎。

JJ 佬 疑似真身 CHENG K_I M_N，有聯絡資料



更加有巴打起左 JJ 佬 （CKM）底




其中一個負責禁住受害者既同黨


另轉面果條友就係第一排右2


早幾分鐘 SKY LEE HALL 個 FB Page 都 Del 埋，為左保住條傻仔
https://www.facebook.com/skylee.hku/

嘩屌你老尾，間垃圾 HELL ON9 到 段片有哂樣都夠膽屈鳩我

依家好多唔知頭唔個路既陌生人 ADD 我 FB 屌我，所以今次真係要各位巴打幫手

‘Hall tradition’: Video of apparent sexual bullying attributed to HKU student dorm culture

A video appearing to show a student slapping another on the face with his penis has circulated among the University of Hong Kong’s students on Wednesday. Anonymous online commenters attributed the incident to “hall tradition.”

The perpetrator in the video wore a hoodie bearing the words “Chemistry HKU,” though it is unclear whether the incident took place at a university dormitory. The video showed several others holding the victim down on a bed and laughing.

The incident received a mixed reaction from students. A post on Facebook page HKU Secrets – which allows users to post anonymously – criticised the way that some students labelled it as part of hall tradition: “Halls love to brainwash people with the ideology of ‘giving it your all’ and ‘having no regrets.'”
